how to romance karlach in bg3
content: porting Alfira the Tiefling Bard with her creative roadblock. Approves if you say you will Free Sazza. (Notably after freeing Sazza from the Cage after breaking or lockpicking the cage, Sazza will go to Karlach with the follow up conversation 8 out of 10 times [Tested]. As Karlach telling Sazza to stop following her will have Sazza stop following her, and if you speak to Sazza as a Custom or Origin character saying "Follow me." This is what Karlach disapproves of.)
